reviews.review_msg: One of the best seminar classes to take! Only two open book midterms, which are based on selected papers that he chooses. The midterm just asks questions whether you understand what the purpose of the paper was and what the authors are doing. The rest of the grade is question/answer in class and explain the purposes of weekly papers. Great class!!

English isnt his first language so its sometimes hard to understand his questions. Focus is on learning how to be critical when reading scientific papers rather than memorizing details. Open book (and internet) exams. Tests your ability to think, not knowledge. Engaging lecturer who is actually funny if you pay attention. Underrated for sure.
